targets.query:
from(bucket: "vmatrix")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system.sysinfo")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "cpu_freq")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.ip, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 1,offset:0)

from(bucket: "vmatrix")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system.sysinfo")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "cpu_freq")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.ip, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 1,offset:0)

from(bucket: "vmatrix")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system.sysinfo" and r._field == "load_avg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.ip, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vmatrix")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system.sysinfo" and r._field == "load_avg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.ip, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vmatrix")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system.sysinfo" and r._field == "load_avg")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.ip, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])
//  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "vmatrix")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system.ecc.cpu_memory" and r._field == "ce_count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.ip, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])

from(bucket: "vmatrix")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system.ecc.cpu_memory" and r._field == "ue_count")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r.ip, set: ${machines:json}))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: max, createEmpty: false)
  |> drop(columns: ["_field"])
